Research

Currently I'm interested in Fine/Dexterous Manipulation and Mobile Manipulation, and which approach, sim2real or demonstrations would be the ultimate solution for Generalist Robots ğŸ¤–. Towards this goal, I think it's crucial that we learn how to better leverage familiar modalities like vision ğŸ‘€ or language ğŸ’¬, while touching other important yet underexplored modalities like tactile ğŸ‘‰ğŸ»ğŸ‘ˆğŸ» or sound ğŸ‘‚ğŸ».
